conbody.p:
The Eucalyptus administrator tools are command-line equivalents of the Eucalyptus Administrator Console functionality. In some cases, they actually offer more functionality than the Eucalyptus Administrator Console. The are automatically installed on the Cloud Controller in the /usr/sbin directory. They include commands such as:
euca_conf
euca-describe-services
euca-modify-services
euca-describe-arbitrators
euca-modify-properties
euca-register-<*>
euca-deregister-<*>
and others
